reviewDescription: I recently switched to Sensodyne toothpaste with Pronamel and have been very pleased with the results. This toothpaste is a great choice for anyone who wants to protect their teeth against sensitivity and enamel erosion, while also promoting overall dental health.One of the things that stands out about Sensodyne toothpaste is its effectiveness at protecting against tooth sensitivity. It contains a unique blend of ingredients, including potassium nitrate, that help to desensitize teeth and reduce pain and discomfort. This makes it a great choice for anyone who suffers from tooth sensitivity due to hot or cold food and drinks.Another great feature of Sensodyne toothpaste is its ability to protect against enamel erosion. It contains fluoride, which helps to strengthen and protect tooth enamel against erosion from acid wear. This makes it a great choice for anyone who wants to promote overall dental health and protect against tooth decay.In addition to its functional benefits, Sensodyne toothpaste also has a refreshing taste and leaves my mouth feeling clean and fresh. It's also very gentle on my teeth and gums, which makes it a great choice for daily use.Overall, I would highly recommend Sensodyne toothpaste to anyone in the market for a toothpaste that is effective at protecting against sensitivity and enamel erosion, while also promoting overall dental health. Its unique blend of ingredients, refreshing taste, and gentle formula make it a must-have for anyone who wants to maintain healthy and strong teeth.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on March 27, 2023

reviewDescription: I have been using Sensodyne Pronamel Intensive Enamel Repair toothpaste for a few weeks now, and I have to say, it has been a game-changer for my dental health. As someone with sensitive teeth, I appreciate the relief it provides.The toothpaste is incredibly effective at repairing and strengthening enamel, which is crucial for maintaining healthy teeth. I have noticed a significant improvement in the sensitivity of my teeth, and I am confident that this toothpaste is helping to protect my teeth from further damage.What sets Sensodyne Pronamel Intensive Enamel Repair apart from other toothpaste is its gentle yet effective formula. It is gentle enough for daily use and doesn't cause any irritation or discomfort. The toothpaste has a pleasant flavor, and I like how clean and fresh it leaves my mouth feeling.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on April 12, 2023

reviewDescription: This was recommended by my dentist on the grounds that I am "on the cavity spectrum." News to me. But apparently after many, many years of mistreating my teeth by doing things like chewing, my enamel is in need of repair, and according to my dentist this is the stuff that will accomplish it. Unless I'm mistaken, this is the first time enamel repair is possible. Tune in in three months, and I'll be able to tell you whether it works.

reviewDescription: Because I have been used to brushing my teeth very hard, the roots of my teeth are exposed, and I feel very uncomfortable every time I brush my teeth.  But after using this toothpaste, my teeth seem to be less uncomfortable.

reviewDescription: I tried every Pronamel toothpaste and everything tasted "meh" until I tried this one. This "Clear Mint" flavor in Repair line tastes by far the best in Pronamel family. It has very fresh, pleasant minty flavor, yet it's not too strong. I hope the manufacturer never discontinues this product.

reviewDescription: I just found out recently how well Sensodyne tooth past works! I have always had sensitive teeth and used sensodyne for a long time. Well I guess I was being cheaper and thought using a normal toothpaste would work. WRONG!!! After my dentist appointment of horror.  My teeth were just killing me when I went in, I wanted them to take them all out! Lol They definitely suggested I go back to Sensodyne. After only a couple of brushing it was amazing at how well my mouth actually felt! Never again will I switch!

reviewDescription: While waiting 6 weeks for endodontics therapy I was able to manage my pain by applying a prescription fluoride treatment at night, and using this OTC toothpaste twice daily.

reviewDescription: This product is good for maintaining good tooth health if experiencing pain in a tooth. In an emergency, get help from your dentist if the pain is too intense. You can't replace an original tooth.
